name: Mateo Una Aventura Jurasica
description:
A time traveling child that has to collect all ancient stones to come back to the present! Help all the dinosaurs and use the stones in the ancient statue to get back to the present.

Victor Rosas: Programming, Voices, UI/UX Placement.
Luciano Santos: Artist, UI Artist, Narrator voice.
Sebastián Toledo: Voices, Programmer helper.
Diego Gutierrez: Voices, SFX, Music.
